subject: RXIL-TReDS - Creation of Factoring Units pertaining to your customers - {{purName}}({{sysDate}})
body:
{{{header}}} Dear Sir/Madam,


This is to inform you that the following Factoring Unit(s) has/have been created on TReDS pertaining to the buyer(s) indicated below.

Factoring Unit ID, Factoring Unit Amount, Invoice No., Invoice Count, Invoice Date, Seller, Buyer, FU Creation Date & Time
{{fuId}}, {{fuAmount}}, {{invoiceNo}}, {{instCount}}, {{invoiceDate}}, {{supName}}, {{purName}}, {{fuCreatedDateTime}}

In case of any query, please contact RXIL on 022-26598336 or write to us on info@rxil.in.

{{{footer}}}
